author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
This week, Tom’s been wrestling Innovation - perhaps the most peculiar deck of cards money can buy. Trying to play ‘Hearts’ with this badboy will surely get you removed from the function. 110 cards of human history, crammed into a box the size of a “not very big box”! What more could you want?
